help:
```Available Commands:
!logs - Guild Warcraft logs
!affix - List of current and next week's Mythic+ affixes
!addon - Required/Suggested addons for raiding
!invasion - Displays the time until end of current invasion, or until the start of the next
!stream - List of guildies that stream
!blood - Website that lists highest values for blood-bought items
!stop - ITS TIME TO STOP```
officer:
```Available commands for officers:
!up - moved Loot Council up
!down - moves Loot Council down
!select - Selects a member from current voice channel and adds them to LC
!reset - clears and resets the LC```
